name: Captain
otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Captain points to a player. Mark that player 'Protected'.
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself). If the 1st dies tonight, the other dies instead.

name: Privateer
otherNightReminder: The Privateer points to two players. If they are different alignments, the Privateer dies.
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself): if they are different alignments, you die.

name: Old Seadog
firstNightReminder: Show 3 arbitrary character tokens not in play. Show 2 arbitrary character tokens in play.
ability: You start knowing 5 characters: 3 not in play & 2 in play.

name: Buccaneer
otherNightReminder: If Buccaneer was correct today, no-one can die tonight.
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly guess an alive player’s character. If correct, no-one can die tonight.

name: First Mate
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of in-play characters’ names contain that letter.
ability: On your 1st night, choose ‘R’, ‘I’ or ‘C’. Learn how many in-play characters’ names contain that letter.

name: Powder Monkey
firstNightReminder: If the Powder Monkey used their ability to target a Minion today: the Powder Monkey and that minion both die tonight.
ability: On your 1st day, publicly choose 2 players: if either is a Minion: you & they die tonight.

name: Landlubber
otherNightReminder: If the Landlubber nominated a Minion today: the Landlubber dies.
ability: Each night*, if you nominated a Minion today, you die.

name: Surgeon
otherNightReminder: If the Surgeon was nominated today and not executed: mark the player that made that nomination 'Protected'.
ability: If a player (not yourself) nominated you today, that player is safe from the Demon tonight.

name: Navigator
firstNightReminder: Point to 1 Townsfolk, 1 Outsider, and 1 Minion. The pointing order is arbitrary.
ability: You start knowing 3 players: 1 a Townsfolk; 1 an Outsider; & 1 a Minion. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Boatswain
otherNightReminder: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a evil player nominated or made a nomination today. Place the 'Evil Nom' marker (remove 'Evil Nom', if any).
ability: Each night*, learn whether an evil player nominated or was nominated yesterday.

name: Wench
firstNightReminder: Wake the Wench if a player would die, but does not because of an ability.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Wench if a player would die, but does not because of an ability.
ability: Each night*, learn how many players would have died, but didn't beacuse protection from an ability.

name: Smuggler
firstNightReminder: If the Smuggler died at night, they point to a player. Then they choose a Townsfolk character. If that player not the Demon: they become the chosen Townsfolk character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment.
otherNightReminder: If the Smuggler died at night, they point to a player. Then they choose a Townsfolk character. If that player not the Demon: they become the chosen Townsfolk character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment.
ability: If you die at night, choose a player & a Townsfolk: if not the Demon, they become that Townsfolk.

name: Hermit Crab
ability: If only 3 players are alive & you've never nominated a player: your team wins. [+1 Outsider]

name: Barnacle
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player: you may only vote if they vote. You only win if they win (even if dead).

name: Grog Blossom
ability: You do not know you are Grog Blossom. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not. You register as evil & as a Minion or Outsider.

name: Mermaid
ability: Players (not yourself or the Demon) that nominate you are drunk until you are nominated again, even if you are dead.

name: Stowaway
otherNightReminder: If Stowaway has died; show the Grimoire to a Minion for as long as needed
ability: If you are “mad” about being an in-play Townsfolk, you cannot die at night. When you die, a Minion sees the Grimoire each night.

name: Voodoo Priestess
otherNightReminder: Wake both swapped players to inform them of their new role if an evil player nominated a Demon.
ability: Twice per game, when an evil player nominates a Demon, you & that Demon swap characters.

name: Undead Pirate
ability: After you are executed & die, tonight you may choose a living good neighbour: they die.

name: Sea Spirit
firstNightReminder: Show the marked character token. Point to marked player.
ability: On your 1st night, choose a good player: they are poisoned. If they live while just 3 players live, evil wins (even if dead).

name: Flesh-Eater
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they are poisoned until dusk. If they die tonight, they die tomorrow night instead.

name: Kraken
otherNightReminder: The Kraken points to a player. That player dies. If that player was the 1st Outsider killed by the Kraken, their living good neighbor dies.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you kill an Outsider, 1 of their living good neighbors die too. [−1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Calypso
firstNightReminder: Write down the word chosen by Calypso. Mark players through-out the day.
otherNightReminder: Write down the word chosen by Calypso. Mark players through-out the day.
ability: Each night, choose a word. Tomorrow, players that publically say that word might die at night or be poisoned. Good might lose if players actively don’t talk.

name: Rusalka
firstNightReminder: Decide the Rusalka's entire ability. Show marked good player Ruslka ability. If the Rusalka's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Rusalka and run their ability.
otherNightReminder: If the Rusalka's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Rusalka and run their ability.
ability: You do not know what your ability is. 1 good player knows your ability. If they are “mad” that the Rusalka is in play, you learn your ability.

name: Umibōzu
firstNightReminder: Show YOU ARE Umibōzu marker to Minion
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not. This ability malfunctions if another Demon chooses a different player. [1 Minion is Umibōzu]

name: Bilge Rat
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: their ghost vote counts as 3 votes.

name: Scurvy Scalawag
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): they get a 1d6 vote die. Tomorrow, if they vote, their vote counts the number rolled. A 6 executes themselves.

name: Commodore
ability: Once per game, publically choose a player that talked like a pirate today. If they are a different alignment than you, they die.

name: Cursed Mutineer
ability: If there is a dead player in-play, only you & dead players can nominate.

name: Castaway
ability: If you cast a ghost vote today, you gain an in-play ability (even if dead). You can't call for your own exile.
